channel.title: Need help adding weapons to do the real hit

item.title: Need help adding weapons to do the real hit
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

ok i need help adding weapons to do the actual hit, i am using devolution.
all weapons, except bows, will just hit real fast and you practically can’t see anything.
I want the weapons to do the real hit’s like d2h spin hit, rune skimmy slice like, rune longsword the chop looking attack. note that was examples of attack style things, that the weapons automatically do.

also i don’t have this part either

f(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1333
{
return 406;
}

if someone could help me add them or get me a guide i would most appriciate it.
and i will R3P++

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding weapons to do the real hit
